institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 10 (Selection of Joint Training Center)
contents: Article 10 (Selection of Joint Training Center) ① In accordance with Article 7 of the Regulations, the Chairman of the Board shall select the joint training center through public contest, etc. for institutions that fall under each item of Article 4, Paragraph 1 of the Regulations. However, for-profit organizations whose main business is education and training cannot be selected as a joint training center. ② The selection of a joint training center shall be in accordance with Table 3, “Examination standards and methods for selection of a joint training center.” ③ The Chairman may reject the application if the organization that applied for selection as a joint training center falls under any of the following. 1. If the proviso to paragraph 1 applies, 2. If the application for selection of a joint training center is made more than twice in the relevant year, ④ If the chairman selects a joint training center, submit Form No. 2 of the Business Manual in accordance with Article 10 of the Regulations. The “National Human Resources Development Consortium Project Joint Training Center Selection Notice” must be notified to the relevant joint training center, and the “National Human Resources Development Consortium Project Agreement” in Form No. 3 of the Business Manual must be signed.
